QuestData.Title: Larion at Large
QuestData.Description:
Some larions are more particular about the people they bond with than others.
Lentios is my companion, the larion I trust most with my life. I love the others as well, but he is a part of my soul.
One of my pride, Andira, has posed a struggle for me to bond with. She ran off into the pastures once again, and I fear she's gotten into something she shouldn't have.
Would you mind finding her and bringing her home?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Andira in the Golden Pasture and return her to Nemea's Retreat.
QuestData.RewardText: Incredible! It seems Andira has taken a liking to you. Perhaps you would be interested in bonding with her further?
